refnamediv.refpurpose: SQL命令として実行可能な形式の連想配列の値に変換する

refentry.refsect1:
説明
arraypg_convert resourceconnection stringtable_name arrayassoc_array intoptions
pg_convertはチェックし、SQL命令として実行可能 な形式のassoc_arrayに変換します。 Precondition for pg_convert is the existence of a table table_name which has at least as many columns as assoc_array has elements. The fieldnames as well as the fieldvalues in table_name must match the indices and values of assoc_array. Returns an array with the converted values on success, &false; otherwise.
&warn.experimental.func;
pg_metadataも参照ください。
